Purpose: To detect oligoclonal immunoglobulin bands for diagnosing and monitoring multiple sclerosis and other neurological conditions involving intrathecal IgG synthesis.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) for serum; sterile, leak-proof container for CSF
Equipment: Isoelectric focusing (IEF) system with gel electrophoresis apparatus and immunofixation electrophoresis (IFE) setup
